welcome_message_body: Welcome to Urayasu, Japan! Known for its beautiful waterfront views and close proximity to Tokyo Disneyland, we invite you to explore and enjoy the charm of our city during your visit.

restaurants.name: PIZZA SALVATORE CUOMO 浦安
restaurants.description: PIZZA SALVATORE CUOMO 浦安 is a pizzeria located in 浦安市.

restaurants.name: 唐揚げとフィッシュ&チップスのお店 たまりば
restaurants.description: 唐揚げとフィッシュ&チップスのお店 たまりば is a fish and chips shop located in 浦安市.
restaurants.address: 北栄1-6-20 (浦安駅チカ), 浦安市, 千葉県, 279-0001

restaurants.name: 広島風お好み焼き じゅん平 浦安店
restaurants.description: 広島風お好み焼き じゅん平 浦安店 is a okonomiyaki restaurant located in 浦安市.

restaurants.name: 印度家庭料理レカ(Reka)
restaurants.description: 印度家庭料理レカ(Reka) is a indian restaurant located in 東京.

restaurants.name: Ikinari Steak (いきなり!ステーキ)
restaurants.description: Ikinari Steak (いきなり!ステーキ) is a steakhouse located in 市川市.
restaurants.address: 相之川4-17-2 (メトロセンター南行徳2番街), 市川市, 千葉県, 272-0143

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Primarily used for domestic flights, but also serves some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the network for free for up to 3 hours.
